attributes.action: Lift the exemption on prisons and ban prisoners from smoking to protect the health and safety of prison officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are one year into the smoking ban and yet prison officers are still exposed to second hand smoke. The Goverment continue to play roulette with our lives after a multi million pound campaign informing us and the public that it will eventually kill us yet claim they must balance the needs of criminals over law abiding prison officers. PLEASE SUPPORT THIS PETITION
